title: Cyclops Forced Me Gay
description: Ampelios finds himself stranded on a mysterious island after the ship she was traveling home to Greece has been destroyed upon the rocky shore. Trying to stay alive and find a way back home, Ampelios is taken prisoner by a Cyclops who has only one use for him. This is a 3,500 word hardcore gay cyclops sex story featuring anal, dub con, straight to gay and cream pies. Do not read unless over 18!
author: Hunter Fox
